comments.body: Hey @ScrapCodes just so I understand - does this project just exist purely to bring Spark's rules into scope for the sbt build? If so, do you mind adding a short doc/description at the top here? Otherwise it will be pretty confusing for developers who see this thing that doesn't appear to be explicitly used anywhere.
